entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Flurries inland early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
